document_title: Warts on hands (fingers): Causes, signs, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Hand warts are skin infections caused by the human HPV virus. Warts form small bumps on the skin that feel dry to the touch. Luckily this is not a dangerous disease. There is currently no cure for HPV, but most people will recover from hand warts within 2-3 years. (first)
subsection_title: mun coc o tay.json. What are hand warts?
subsection_data:
mun coc o tay.json. What are hand warts?
Hand warts are skin infections caused by the human HPV virus. Warts form small bumps on the skin that feel dry to the touch. Luckily this is not a dangerous disease. There is currently no cure for HPV, but most people will recover from hand warts within 2-3 years. (first)
